title: PROD LIKE ENVIRONMENT - BUS SANITY CHECKS

task_list.instruction_title:
BUS SANITY CHECKS on PROD LIKE before start of the CSD Migration
Please also check BUS Package version + iib_check_bus.sh

For Secli please check:
_- Check BUS config + Java Config for BUS
- Ensure BUS SECLI **PROD LIKE **ENVIRONMENT targets ATLAS **PROD LIKE **ENVIRONMENT
Please check the connectivity Between Altas and Secli onr Prod Like Environment. Atlas must not be isolated.
